Posts.Content: HI im new to this so any help is much appreciated. i had a mastectomy on 30 /5/12 with the removal of sentinal node and biopsy of two nodes,i also had an op on my right shoulder on 31/03/12 .i was just getting my shoulder working again with physio when i was diagnosed with padgets ,tomorrow i go back to hospital to find out my results im so nervous and worried. im still in lots of discomfort is this the norm?i try to be positive but not always easy.
Posts.Title: padgets of the nipple
